DOC.brief_title: Balanced Salt Solution VS. Normal Saline Solution Septic Shock
DOC.detailed_description: The survive sepsis campaign guideline recommend isotonic crystalloids first choice initial fluid resuscitation . The isotonic crystalloids include chloride-rich solution ( eg.NSS ) balance salt solution . Retrospective study show normal saline induce hyperchloremic metabolic acidosis acute kidney injury . However , randomize control trial compare efficacy balance salt solution chloride rich solution .
